short_summary: Printer, scanner and multifunctional equipment maintenance
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W3162-23F026HLSArray2ng dated November 22, 2023 with a closing of Thursday December 14, 2023 at 2.pm EDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defense (DND), is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of 40 desktop label printers and 50 barcode scanners including the delivery located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada) as. detailed in Annex Statement requirement.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Title English**: Request for Proposal - Label Printers and Barcode Scanners
**Title French**: **demande de Proposition** - Imprimantes à étiquettes de bureau et Lecteurs de Code à Barres

**Notice Reference**: WS4317205198-Doc4352873254
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Solicitation Number**: WS4317205198
**Publication Date**: December 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: January 12, 2024 (14:00:00)
**Amendment Date**: January 3, 2024

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
**Request for Proposal Description**:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defense (DND) invites bids for the acquisition of label printers and barcode scanners. The requested delivery will be located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

**Bid Requirements**:

* 40 desktop label printers
* 50 barcode scanners

**Evaluation Criteria**:

Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**:

The bid solicitation is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Contact Information**:  
Name: Renee-Ann Therien  
Email: renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
Phone: None  
Fax: None  
  
**Notice URL**:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18318997?extsite=MTgzMTg5OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This rewritten text maintains the core elements of the original text with polished slight rephrasing and a very minimalist style. Key information is to the point without it being buried. It follows the most professional formatting and respect the importance of language when important in this executive summary. Noting that original text contained the full catalog of what a tender might contain, it appears to be necessary to include the contact info mailadresses not included but could be changed to personal details only lieu prev.
